      A method to be called when the cashier scans an item
      Specified by:
      scanItem in interface ServerCheckoutModel
      Parameters:
      barCode - needs to provide a valid item id as a String
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of the current Items in the checkout
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the barcode is not found as WRONG_BARCODE or if there are no more items for the current barcode as NO_MORE_ITEMS_IN_STOCK

      Returns:
      the total amount for the current checkout
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there are no items in the current checkout

    • cancelCheckout

      public void cancelCheckout()
      A method to be called if the cashier wants to cancel the checkout being currently in progress (e.g. the customer can not pay / the customer doesn't want to buy the items for some reason)
      Specified by:
      cancelCheckout in interface ServerCheckoutModel

    • cancelCheckout

      public void cancelCheckout(Integer checkoutId)
      A method to be used if the cashier wants to undo an already completed checkout (e.g. customer wants the money back, the checkout was done for testing purposes)
      Specified by:
      cancelCheckout in interface ServerCheckoutModel
      Parameters:
      checkoutId - the id of the checkout needed to be undone

    • completePayment

      public void completePayment(PaymentType paymentType)
      A method to be called after the cashier checks out an order and has the meaning to update the checkout with the correct payment method as specified by the cashier
      Specified by:
      completePayment in interface ServerCashierModel
      Parameters:
      paymentType - the payment method used
